situation.title: I registered for vaccination, but I have nowhere to enter my PIN2, or I did not receive it
situation.meta_description: An explanation of why PIN2 may not arrive immediately after registration for vaccination and why you did not receive a vaccination date

content.processed:
From January 22nd, 2021, PIN2 will only be available if there is a free vaccination date at the selected-preferred vaccination site during registration. It will therefore be possible to make reservations immediately (for the 1st and 2nd dose). If the dates are already filled and others are not available (e.g. due to the lack of vaccines), no text message with PIN2 will arrive. But as soon as the date is available, you will receive an "invitation" text message. At reservatic.com/ockovani the reservation can be made with an "invitation" message.

Before January 22nd, after the registration, it was necessary to check every day for the reservation to see if the date would be released (unless the date was immediately available). If you registered before January 22nd and you already have a PIN2, but you have not yet been able to book an appointment, you will also start receiving "invitation" text messages from January 22nd, so it is no longer necessary to watch out for free dates every day at reservatic.com/ockovani. The process is then the same as for persons registered from January 22nd.

 

It will not be possible to make a reservation without an "invitation" text message.

 

Explanation of the 2nd phase of applying for vaccination: registration and reservation.
